name: rulek-web
description: RuleK Web UI - 规则怪谈管理者

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web/frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run install:playwright
scripts.test:simple: cd web/frontend && npx playwright test tests/phase0-simple.spec.ts
scripts.fix:ports: lsof -ti:5173 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:5174 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null
scripts.fix:all: npm run fix:ports && npm install --save-dev @playwright/test playwright chalk && cd web/frontend && npm install
scripts.start: npm run fix:ports && npm run dev:all
